item.title: What I've Been Drinking in Quarantine (Plus a Cocktail Lesson)
item.description: Introduction The past ten-or-so months of limited activity due to Covid-19 have been a slog for everyone, to say the least. I’ve been fortunate to have avoided the worst of it, having spent much of the past ten months living in rural northwestern Connecticut. Many of us have had lots of time to explore hobbies over this time, and something that has gained lots of popularity – editor’s note: unsurprisingly – is drinking!
